names.english: decoction of rhinoceros horn and rehmannia root for clearing heat from the collaterals
names.commonEnglish: Decoction of Rhinoceros Horn and Rehmannia Root for Clearing Heat from Collaterals

actions: Clears Heat from the Ying and Xue stages,
relieves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
With Sheng Di Huang, for loss of consciousness and delirium, with epistaxis, hematemesis or purpura due to Blood Heat.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Bai Mao Gen, cools the Blood, draws out toxicity and reduces searing Heat for Ying Stage Heat.
Clears Heat especially in the Upper Jiao, relieves toxicity, cools the Blood and promotes urination.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and reduces swelling.
With Bai Mao Gen, for hematuria, hematemesis, and epistaxis due to warm febrile disease.
With Shui Niu Jiao, Sheng Di Huang and Chi Shao, for Xue Stage Heat.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Ying and Xue Stage Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain, clears Heat, cools the Blood and reduces swelling.
With Tao Ren, for Blood Stasis.
With Mu Dan Pi, for Blood Stasis disorders.
Breaks up Blood Stasis, invigorates Blood circulation, moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels.
Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, clears Heat and promotes urination.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Heat injuring the Yin and bleeding due to Heat in the Blood.
Clears Heat
Eliminates toxins
Invigorates the Blood
Removes Blood Stasis
Unblocks the channels

symptoms: Closure of fontanel sutures with recurrent separation
Dark and scanty and deep yellow urine
manifestations.pulse: Taut and rapid with a purple, sluggish superficial venule of index finger

modifications.purpose: Stagnation of Phlegm and Heat, chest distress with nausea and a red tongue with a yellowish coat
